nodes.text: Empire's Justice was a hyperspace quadrant in the Endor system.
To those not belonging to the Empire's ranks, the Empire's Justice quadrant could be highly dangerous. Travel here was not recommended unless the traveler was on the best of terms with the Empire.
Alliance Pilots were warned to beware of Imperial pilot Saper, who was assigned to patrol the area during 1 ABY.
Aside from the Galactic Empire, this quadrant was also inhabited by the Jillion Bolts Company, and Contraband Incorporated transports.
